channel.title: Comments on: Hosted Internet Services (Email, DNS)

item.title: By: Brad
item.dc:creator: Brad
item.description: I've used http://www.easydns.com/ for years, their service is great.
item.content:encoded: I’ve used http://www.easydns.com/ for years, their service is great.

item.title: By: Sergey
item.dc:creator: Sergey
item.description: I use http://nearlyfreespeech.net/ and their dns panel is really good -- powerful but not intimidating. And it's free.
item.content:encoded: I use http://nearlyfreespeech.net/ and their dns panel is really good — powerful but not intimidating. And it’s free.

item.title: By: Adam Kalsey
item.dc:creator: Adam Kalsey
item.description: I use ZoneEdit for DNS for a number of domains. It's free for up to 5 zones and cheap after that. And it's quite stable and easy to configure. They also have a number of premium add-on services like MX backups.
item.content:encoded: I use ZoneEdit for DNS for a number of domains. It’s free for up to 5 zones and cheap after that. And it’s quite stable and easy to configure. They also have a number of premium add-on services like MX backups.
